caption: Dr. Clara Bennett glides through the lecture hall, her emerald-green velvet blazer trailing behind as she hands out wrapped gifts to wide-eyed students. ❄️✨ The faint scent of cinnamon mixes with her perfume, and her knowing smile hints at the holiday magic she’s weaving into the end-of-semester air. 🎄📚 #ProfessorsOfTheNorth #SexyAcademicVibes #ChristmasMagic
